author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
ALCA/DB: you are of course welcome to look, but your sign-off here is not actually needed, you are seeing this only via smaller, separate PR #14201.  This PR can be rebased once you sign that PR!  

HLT:  This adds new ESProducers for (presently unused) new Conditions, which will be needed by the updated uGT emulator which provides bitwise correct emulation of all correlation conditions.

Please pre-emptively update the HLT configs to provide the ES content as in:

```
   L1Trigger/L1TGlobal/python/GlobalParameters_cff.py
```

This will have no effect currently, but having these conditions ready will mean that we can turn on the update to uGT with no change to HLT configs.  @fwyzard suggested this approach, which I believe is wise.

Note that the Prescales/Vetos ES object will _not_ be requested by uGT emulator when those are not re-emulated... so you should never need such a dummy producer in HLT configs.
title: Prepare HLT for New Conditions needed by update of uGT Emulation
